office.title: Office
office.value: Kyrgyz Republic, Bishkek, 178 Panfilov St., office #406

hero.title: Invest confidently
hero.desc: Effective support for business, entrepreneurship, trading, as well as trade and services in all key areas, including work with national projects, international cooperation and global support, will ensure the conditions for the development and achievement of users' goals.

about.title: Invest wisely and confidently
about.desc: Effective support for business, entrepreneurship, trading, trade and services in all key areas, including national projects, international cooperation and global support, will ensure that you can develop and achieve your goals

ourPlatform.title: Our platform:
ourPlatform.subtitle: your solution for every challenge
ourPlatform.desc: CJSC 'Financial Infrastructure' is a key player in global trade, marketing, investment activities and realization of large business projects in Kyrgyzstan.

missionAndGoal.title: Our goal and mission
missionAndGoal.desc: Our mission is to promote the development of the Kyrgyz Republic, protect the state interests and support domestic brands, companies and associations. We aim to implement international investment, commercial and business projects with the active involvement of local communities, entrepreneurs and shareholders of the country. Together we strengthen Kyrgyzstan's national and state initiatives, while enhancing its image and prestige on the world stage

list.title: Experience
list.desc: our joint-stock company was founded by a group of experienced entrepreneurs who are ready to share their knowledge with our shareholders

list.title: Reliability
list.desc: The principle of building the company is based on respect for all rights and laws, and it is this direction that guarantees a safe investment

list.title: Benefit
list.desc: We undertake only those projects and offer only those services in which we understand 100% and from which we guarantee benefits to the company's shareholders.

list.title: Development
list.desc: The company's goals are built for the years ahead, we will follow them with the guarantee of multiplying profitability and position in the international arena

goals.title: Setting New Goals and Achieving Them!
goals.desc: International trade knows no boundaries, and with the best professionals on your team, any project can be implemented with maximum benefits and prospects for long-term growth.

list.title: Submit a Request
list.desc: Specify your proposal, cooperation interests, or consultation request.

list.title: Feedback
list.desc: Your request will be forwarded to a relevant specialist.

list.title: First meeting
list.desc: We will provide up-to-date information and discuss possible steps for cooperation.

hero.title: About Us
hero.desc: We are a team of professionals united by a common goal: to contribute to the development of Kyrgyzstan, support local companies and brands, and create opportunities for entry into international markets.

AboutPage.about: CJSC 'Financial Infrastructure' is a key player in the fields of global trade, marketing, investments, and implementation of large business projects in Kyrgyzstan. Our team comprises highly qualified specialists with international experience in trade, national project management, analytics, and business development.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.listTitle: To contribute to the development of the Kyrgyz Republic through:
list: Supporting local brands, companies, and associations.
Implementing international investment, commercial, and business initiatives.

list.title: Structure
list.desc: The founder of CJSC 'Financial Infrastructure' is the Ministry of Economy and Commerce of the Kyrgyz Republic (with 100% state participation in the authorized capital).

list.title: Goals
list.desc: The company was created to monitor trade flows involving Kyrgyz companies whose goods do not enter the territory of the Kyrgyz Republic.

list.title: Tasks
list.desc: Carrying out international trade, organizing and monitoring financial operations, managing international trade, addressing currency risks, and ensuring the financial stability of the Kyrgyz Republic. This highlights the importance of state support in the field of trade.

list.title: Privileges
list.desc: CJSC 'Financial Infrastructure' has the right to conduct operations and settlements under contracts for goods and services that do not enter the territory of Kyrgyzstan. Activities are carried out with commercial banks without restrictions, ensuring flexibility and accessibility of financial operations.
